name: PlayRight
memberOrga: PlayRight has more than 10.000 affiliated performers.
goal:
PlayRight is a collective management society for the neighbouring rights of performers.

PlayRight manages the remuneration rights of actors and musicians.

Apart from its activities as a collecting society, PlayRight follows up on all developments (legal and other) concerning the professional live of performers. Furthermore, PlayRight takes part in advising musicians and actors on neighbouring rights and defends their position with policy makers and in negotiations with users.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Culture, Information Society
euInitiatives: All initiatives, policies and legislation concerning Neighbouring Rights, CopyRight, Audiovisual and Media-services, E-commerce, Digital Single Market and Information Society.
